TopicTitle: TheScareCake is Xploring new "Super eve" system!

Articles.Content:
Hello, i saw a Super eve system mod, it basically creates another eve with very creative and interesting moons in it. As i type this now, the mod is in early stage, but it is playable. Im doing this for showoff this mod, search for bugs and, like i said, Xplore (i call it like that). Big thanks for Cooly568 for creating this "Another" planet pack. Oh, and one more thing: i like this mod and this is just my opinion, if you dont, dont say it.

Link to the mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69341-0-23-Super-Eve-Planet-Pack-0-1-1

It works with 0.24.2, but it has many bugs in it.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Stay tuned, i will upload almost every screenshot i will have, i like to spam f1.
